General.Name: Thinkon Semiconductor Jinzhou Corp
General.Description: Thinkon Semiconductor Jinzhou Corp. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of monocrystalline silicon products for IC etching in China and internationally. The company offers silicon rods, cylinders, disks, rings, and sheets. Thinkon Semiconductor Jinzhou Corp. was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Jinzhou, China.
